description: [Agent Tesla](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0331) has used SMTP for C2 communications.(Citation: Cofense Agent Tesla)(Citation: Fortinet Agent Tesla June 2017)(Citation: Bitdefender Agent Tesla April 2020)

external_references.description: Arsene, L. (2020, April 21). Oil & Gas Spearphishing Campaigns Drop Agent Tesla Spyware in Advance of Historic OPEC+ Deal. Retrieved May 19, 2020.
James Arndt. (2023, February 21). The Rise of Agent Tesla: Understanding the Notorious Keylogger. Retrieved January 10, 2024.
Zhang, X. (2017, June 28). In-Depth Analysis of A New Variant of .NET Malware AgentTesla. Retrieved November 5, 2018.
